project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a CSV file and calculates the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Implement functionality to read the CSV file
Implement calculation of mean for specified numerical columns
Implement calculation of median for specified numerical columns
Implement calculation of mode for specified numerical columns
Write tests for the functionality described above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
